articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: Virat Kohli "Doesn't Play In My Team If...": Matthew Hayden's Blunt Selection Message - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Australia great Matthew Hayden doesn't think Virat Kohli should be selected in the Indian team if he doesn't open in the T20 World Cup 2024.
articles.content: India's marquee batter Virat Kohli has seen his place in the team being questioned time and again ahead of the T20 World Cup 2024. Though Virat was in superb form in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2… [+1448 chars]
